00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: Error.php 224 2009-04-14 22:50:37Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief Error class.
00005  * 
00006  * Used to handle PHP errors.
00007  * 
00008  * Error constant values:
00009  * \li \c E_ERROR = 1
00010  * \li \c E_WARNING = 2
00011  * \li \c E_PARSE = 4
00012  * \li \c E_NOTICE = 8
00013  * \li \c E_CORE_ERROR = 16
00014  * \li \c E_CORE_WARNING = 32
00015  * \li \c E_COMPILE_ERROR = 64
00016  * \li \c E_COMPILE_WARNING = 128
00017  * \li \c E_USER_ERROR = 256
00018  * \li \c E_USER_WARNING = 512
00019  * \li \c E_USER_NOTICE = 1024
00020  * \li \c E_ALL = 32767 in PHP 6, 30719 in PHP 5.3.x, 6143 in PHP 5.2.x
00021  * \li \c E_STRICT = 2048
00022  * \li \c E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR = 4096
00023  * \li \c E_DEPRECATED = 8192 since PHP 5.3.0
00024  * \li \c E_USER_DEPRECATED = 16384 since PHP 5.3.0
00025  * 
00026  * @class       Boo_Error
00027  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00028  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00029  * @copyright   2008 David Singer
00030  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00031  * @version     1.8.1
00032  */
00033

00090     /**
00091      * @brief Default constructor.
00092      * 
00093      * Copies superglobals to the class instance and serializes them.
00094      * 
00095      * @see http://us3.php.net/reserved.variables
00096      * @return void.
00097      */
00098     public function __construct() {
00099         
00100         // keeps PDO happy
00101         try {
00102             if (isset($GLOBALS)) {
00103                 $globals = serialize($GLOBALS);
00104                 $this->globals = $globals;
00105             } else {
00106                 $this->globals = '';
00107             }
00108         } catch (Exception $e) {
00109             $this->globals = '';
00110         }
00111         
00112         if (isset($_SERVER)) {
00113             $server = serialize($_SERVER);
00114             $this->server = $server;
00115         } else {
00116             $this->server = '';
00117         }
00118         
00119         if (isset($_GET)) {
00120             $get = serialize($_GET);
00121             $this->get = $get;
00122         } else {
00123             $this->get = '';
00124         }
00125         
00126         if (isset($_POST)) {
00127             $post = serialize($_POST);
00128             $this->post = $post;
00129         } else {
00130             $this->post = '';
00131         }
00132         
00133         if (isset($_FILES)) {
00134             $files = serialize($_FILES);
00135             $this->files = $files;
00136         } else {
00137             $this->files = '';
00138         }
00139         
00140         if (isset($_REQUEST)) {
00141             $request = serialize($_REQUEST);
00142             $this->request = $request;
00143         } else {
00144             $this->request = '';
00145         }
00146         
00147         if (isset($_SESSION)) {
00148             $session = serialize($_SESSION);
00149             $this->session = $session;
00150         } else {
00151             $this->session = '';
00152         }
00153         
00154         if (isset($_ENV)) {
00155             $env = serialize($_ENV);
00156             $this->env = $env;
00157         } else {
00158             $this->env = '';
00159         }
00160         
00161         if (isset($_COOKIE)) {
00162             $cookie = serialize($_COOKIE);
00163             $this->cookie = $cookie;
00164         } else {
00165             $this->cookie = '';
00166         }
00167         
00168         $this->created = time();
00169         
00170         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'])) {
00171             $this->userAgent = $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'];
00172         } else {
00173             $this->userAgent = '';
00174         }
00175         
00176         $this->ip = Boo_Page::getIp();
00177         $this->uuid = Boo_Helper::getUuid();
00178     }
00179     
00180     public function setError($error, $errorString, $filename, $line, $symbols) {
00181         $this->error = (int) $error;
00182         $this->errorString = trim($errorString);
00183         $this->filename = trim($filename);
00184         $this->line = trim($line);
00185         
00186         // fixes errors serializing stack traces
00187         try {
00188             $this->symbols = serialize($symbols);
00189         } catch (Exception $e) {
00190             $this->symbols = serialize($e->getTraceAsString());
00191             
00192         }
00193         
00194         // as of php 5.2.0 return FALSE to populate $phpErrormsg
00195         return !BOO_DEBUG;;
00196     }

00236     public static function getErrorName($error) {
00237         $error = (int) $error;
00238         switch ($error) {
00239             case E_ERROR:
00240                 $errorName = 'E_ERROR';
00241                 break;
00242                 
00243             case E_WARNING:
00244                 $errorName = 'E_WARNING';
00245                 break;
00246                 
00247             case E_PARSE:
00248                 $errorName = 'E_PARSE';
00249                 break;
00250                 
00251             case E_NOTICE:
00252                 $errorName = 'E_NOTICE';
00253                 break;
00254                 
00255             case E_CORE_ERROR:
00256                 $errorName = 'E_CORE_ERROR';
00257                 break;
00258                 
00259             case E_CORE_WARNING:
00260                 $errorName = 'E_CORE_WARNING';
00261                 break;
00262                 
00263             case E_COMPILE_ERROR:
00264                 $errorName = 'E_COMPILE_ERROR';
00265                 break;
00266                 
00267             case E_COMPILE_WARNING:
00268                 $errorName = 'E_COMPILE_WARNING';
00269                 break;
00270                 
00271             case E_USER_ERROR:
00272                 $errorName = 'E_USER_ERROR';
00273                 break;
00274                 
00275             case E_USER_WARNING:
00276                 $errorName = 'E_USER_WARNING';
00277                 break;
00278                 
00279             case E_USER_NOTICE:
00280                 $errorName = 'E_USER_NOTICE';
00281                 break;
00282                 
00283             case E_ALL:
00284                 $errorName = 'E_ALL';
00285                 break;
00286                 
00287             case E_STRICT:
00288                 $errorName = 'E_STRICT';
00289                 break;
00290                 
00291             case E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR:
00292                 $errorName = 'E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR';
00293                 break;
00294                 
00295             case E_DEPRECATED:
00296                 $errorName = 'E_DEPRECATED';
00297                 break;
00298                 
00299             case E_USER_DEPRECATED:
00300                 $errorName = 'E_USER_DEPRECATED';
00301                 break;
00302                 
00303             default: // unknown error
00304                 $errorName = 'UNKNOWN_' . $error;
00305         }
00306         return $errorName;
00307     }

00309     public function dbError(array $ignore = array(), $tableName = 'boo_errors', $primaryKey = 'error_id') {
00310         if (!empty($ignore) && in_array($this->error, $ignore)) {
00311             return true; // ignoring
00312         }
00313         
00314         $io = new Boo_Io($tableName, $primaryKey);
00315         
00316         $io->setField('created', $this->created);
00317         $io->setField('modified', time());
00318         $io->setField('domain', $this->domain);
00319         $io->setField('uuid', $this->uuid);
00320         $io->setField('ip', $this->ip);
00321         $io->setField('error', $this->error);
00322         $io->setField('error_string', $this->errorString);
00323         $io->setField('filename', $this->filename);
00324         $io->setField('line', $this->line);
00325         $io->setField('symbols', $this->symbols);
00326         $io->setField('globals', $this->globals);
00327         $io->setField('server', $this->server);
00328         $io->setField('get', $this->get);
00329         $io->setField('post', $this->post);
00330         $io->setField('files', $this->files);
00331         $io->setField('cookie', $this->cookie);
00332         $io->setField('request', $this->request);
00333         $io->setField('session', $this->session);
00334         $io->setField('env', $this->env);
00335         
00336         $io->save();
00337         return true;
00338     }
00339     
00340     public function logError(array $ignore = array(), $filename = BOO_ERROR_LOG_FILE) {
00341         if (!empty($ignore) && in_array($this->error, $ignore)) {
00342             return true; // ignoring
00343         }
00344         
00345         if (file_exists($filename)) {
00346             $time = date('c', $this->created);
00347             $errorName = self::getErrorName($this->error);
00348             
00349             $content = "{$time}|"
00350                 . "{$this->domain}|"
00351                 . "{$this->uuid}|"
00352                 . "{$this->ip}|"
00353                 . "{$errorName}|"
00354                 . "{$this->errorString}|"
00355                 . "{$this->filename}|"
00356                 . "{$this->line}|"
00357                 . "{$this->symbols}|"
00358                 . "{$this->globals}|"
00359                 . "{$this->server}|"
00360                 . "{$this->get}|"
00361                 . "{$this->post}|"
00362                 . "{$this->files}|"
00363                 . "{$this->cookie}|"
00364                 . "{$this->session}|"
00365                 . "{$this->request}|"
00366                 . "{$this->env}";
00367             
00368             return Boo_Log::write($content, $filename);
00369         } else {
00370             trigger_error("File {$filename} does not exist", E_USER_ERROR);
00371             return false;
00372         }
00373     }
00374     
00375     public function emailError(array $ignore = array()) {
00376         if (!empty($ignore) && in_array($this->error, $ignore)) {
00377             return true; // ignoring
00378         }
00379         
00380         $errorName = self::getErrorName($this->error);
00381         $time = date('c', $this->created);
00382         
00383         $body = "Time: {$time}\n"
00384             . "Domain: {$this->domain}\n"
00385             . "Error UUID: {$this->uuid}\n"
00386             . "IP Address: {$this->ip}\n"
00387             . "Error: {$errorName}\n"
00388             . "Error String: {$this->errorString}\n"
00389             . "Filename: {$this->filename}\n"
00390             . "Line: {$this->line}\n"
00391             . "Symbols: {$this->symbols}\n"
00392             . "\$GLOBALS: {$this->globals}\n"
00393             . "\$_SERVER: {$this->server}\n"
00394             . "\$_GET: {$this->get}\n"
00395             . "\$_POST: {$this->post}\n"
00396             . "\$_FILES: {$this->files}\n"
00397             . "\$_COOKIE: {$this->cookie}\n"
00398             . "\$_SESSION: {$this->session}\n"
00399             . "\$_REQUEST: {$this->request}\n"
00400             . "\$_ENV: {$this->env}\n";
00401         
00402         $send = false;
00403         try {
00404             $smtp = new Swift_Connection_SMTP(BOO_SMTP_SERVER, BOO_SMTP_PORT, BOO_SMTP_ENC);
00405             $smtp->setUsername(BOO_SMTP_USERNAME);
00406             $smtp->setPassword(BOO_SMTP_PASSWORD);
00407             
00408             // start swift 
00409             $swift = new Swift($smtp);
00410             
00411             $swiftMessage = new Swift_Message("{$errorName}: {$this->errorString} in {$this->filename} on line {$this->line}", $body);
00412             
00413             $recipients = new Swift_RecipientList();
00414             $recipients->addTo(BOO_ERROR_EMAIL);
00415             
00416             $send = $swift->send($swiftMessage, $recipients, BOO_FROM_EMAIL);
00417             
00418             $swift->disconnect();
00419         } catch (Exception $e) {
00420             echo $e->getMessage();
00421             // do nothing
00422             return false;
00423         }
00424         return $send;
00425     }
00426     
00427     public function smsError(array $ignore = array()) {
00428         if (!empty($ignore) && in_array($this->error, $ignore)) {
00429             return true; // ignoring
00430         }
00431         
00432         $errorName = self::getErrorName($this->error);
00433         
00434         $sms = new Boo_SMS;
00435         $sms->setPhoneNumber(BOO_SMS_PHONE_NUMBER);
00436         $sms->setCarrierId(BOO_SMS_CARRIER_ID);
00437         $sms->setSubject($errorName);
00438         
00439         $body = substr($this->filename, -20) // last 20 characters of file name
00440             . " {$this->line} " // add line number
00441             . substr($this->errorString, 0, 80); // first 80 characters of error message
00442         
00443         $sms->setBody($body);
00444         $sms->send();
00445         
00446         return true;
00447     }

00449     public function htmlErrorDiv(array $attrs = array()) {
00450         $tmp = '';
00451         $errorName = self::getErrorName($this->error);
00452         $time = date('c', $this->created);
00453         
00454         if (BOO_DEBUG) {
00455             $tmp .= "<p><b>Time</b>: {$time}</p>\n"
00456                 . "<p><b>Domain</b>: {$this->domain}</p>\n"
00457                 . "<p><b>Error UUID</b>: {$this->uuid}</p>\n"
00458                 . "<p><b>IP Address</b>: {$this->ip}</p>\n";
00459         }
00460         
00461         $tmp .= "<p><b>Error</b>: {$errorName}</p>\n"
00462             . "<p><b>Error String</b>: {$this->errorString}</p>\n"
00463             . "<p><b>Filename</b>: {$this->filename}</p>\n"
00464             . "<p><b>Line</b>: {$this->line}</p>\n";
00465         
00466         if (BOO_DEBUG) {
00467             $tmp .= '<p><b>Symbols</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-symbols">show</a>)'
00468                 . '<pre id="boo-error-symbols-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->symbols), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00469                 
00470                 . '<p><b>$GLOBALS</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-globals">show</a>)'
00471                 . '<pre id="boo-error-globals-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->globals), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00472                 
00473                 . '<p><b>$_SERVER</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-server">show</a>)'
00474                 . '<pre id="boo-error-server-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->server), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00475                 
00476                 . '<p><b>$_GET</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-get">show</a>)'
00477                 . '<pre id="boo-error-get-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->get), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00478                 
00479                 . '<p><b>$_POST</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-post">show</a>)'
00480                 . '<pre id="boo-error-post-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->post), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00481                 
00482                 . '<p><b>$_FILES</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-files">show</a>)'
00483                 . '<pre id="boo-error-files-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->files), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00484                 
00485                 . '<p><b>$_COOKIE</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-cookie">show</a>)'
00486                 . '<pre id="boo-error-cookie-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->cookie), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00487                 
00488                 . '<p><b>$_SESSION</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-session">show</a>)'
00489                 . '<pre id="boo-error-session-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->session), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00490                 
00491                 . '<p><b>$_REQUEST</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-request">show</a>)'
00492                 . '<pre id="boo-error-request-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->request), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00493                 
00494                 . '<p><b>$_ENV</b>: (<a href="#" id="boo-error-env">show</a>)'
00495                 . '<pre id="boo-error-env-code" style="display: none;">' . print_r(@unserialize($this->env), true) . "</pre></p>\n"
00496                 
00497                 // add JavaScript file that handles show/hide
00498                 . "<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n"
00499                 . file_get_contents(BOO_JS_DIR . '/error-html.js')
00500                 . "\n</script>\n";
00501         }
00502         
00503         $div = new Boo_Html('div');
00504         $div->applyAttrs($attrs);
00505         $div->setClass('error');
00506         $div->setContent($tmp);
00507         
00508         return $div;
00509     }

00575     
00576     /**
00577      * @brief Determins if an error is critical.
00578      * 
00579      * Errors that are \b not considered critical:
00580      * \li E_NOTICE
00581      * \li E_USER_NOTICE
00582      * \li E_USER_WARNING
00583      * \li E_DEPRECATED
00584      * \li E_USER_DEPRECATED
00585      * \li E_ALL
00586      * 
00587      * Errors that are considered critical:
00588      * \li E_ERROR
00589      * \li E_WARNING
00590      * \li E_PARSE
00591      * \li E_CORE_ERROR
00592      * \li E_CORE_WARNING
00593      * \li E_COMPILE_WARNING
00594      * \li E_COMPILE_ERROR
00595      * \li E_USER_ERROR
00596      * \li E_STRICT
00597      * \li E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR
00598      * 
00599      * @param int $error The error code.
00600      * @return bool Returns TRUE if error is critical, FALSE othereise.
00601      */
00602     public static function isCritical($error) {
00603         $error = (int) $error;
00604         switch ($error) {
00605             // not critical
00606             case E_NOTICE:
00607             case E_USER_NOTICE:
00608             case E_USER_WARNING:
00609             case E_DEPRECATED:
00610             case E_USER_DEPRECATED:
00611             case E_ALL:
00612                 return false;
00613                 break;
00614             // critical
00615             case E_ERROR:
00616             case E_WARNING:
00617             case E_PARSE:
00618             case E_CORE_ERROR:
00619             case E_CORE_WARNING:
00620             case E_COMPILE_ERROR:
00621             case E_COMPILE_WARNING:
00622             case E_USER_ERROR:
00623             case E_STRICT:
00624             case E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR:
00625             default: // unknown error
00626                 return true;
00627         }
00628         // function can never reach this point
00629     }
00630     
00631     public function handleError($error, $errorString, $filename, $line, $symbols) {
00632         $result = $this->setError($error, $errorString, $filename, $line, $symbols);
00633         
00634         if (BOO_PRODUCTION) {
00635             if (self::isCritical($this->error)) {
00636                 if (BOO_SMS_PHONE_NUMBER && BOO_SMS_CARRIER_ID && BOO_SMS_ERROR) {
00637                     $this->smsError();
00638                 }
00639                 $this->emailError();
00640             }
00641             
00642             $this->dbError();
00643         } else {
00644             echo $this->htmlErrorDiv();
00645         }
00646         
00647         return $result;
00648     }
00649     
00650     /**
00651      * @brief Automaticly setup error handing to default settings.
00652      * 
00653      * @return string Returns the result of \c set_error_handler().
00654      * @see http://us.php.net/set_error_handler
00655      * @param int $errorTypes[optional] Can be used to mask the triggering of Boo_Error::errorHandlerCallback().
00656      */
00657     public static function start($errorTypes = false) {
00658         if ($errorTypes === false) {
00659             $errorTypes = ini_get('error_reporting');
00660         }
00661 
00662         return set_error_handler(array('Boo_Error', 'errorHandlerCallback'), $errorTypes);
00663     }
00664     
00665     /**
00666      * @brief Error handler callback method.
00667      * 
00668      * @param int $error Error level.
00669      * @param string $errorString Error message.
00670      * @param string $filename Filename that caused the error.
00671      * @param string $line The line number
00672      * @param array $symbols The active symbols table.
00673      * @return bool Function always returns FALSE.
00674      */
00675     public static function errorHandlerCallback($error, $errorString, $filename, $line, $symbols) {
00676         $booError = new Boo_Error();
00677         $booError->handleError($error, $errorString, $filename, $line, $symbols);
00678 
00679         // as of php 5.2.0 return FALSE to populate $phpErrormsg
00680         return !BOO_DEBUG;
00681     }
00682 }
